alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 10:52PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Hamilton County through 1115 PM CDT... At 1051 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Webster City, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Hamilton County, including the following locations... Kamrar and Blairsburg. This includes Interstate 35 near mile marker 145. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
